title: Sisters In Blizzard
special_thanks: The Harold & Mimi Steinberg Trust for the their support of Youngblood and new play productions at EST.

org.name: EST Youngblood
org.description: 2012 Obie Award Winners, Youngblood is EST's collective of emerging professional playwrights under the age of 30. For 21 years, Youngblood has nurtured the best new playwriting talents through regular meetings, readings, retreats, workshops, and mainstage productions. Recent Youngblood graduates include acclaimed writers Annie Baker, Amy Herzog, Lucy Alibar, Robert Askins, Qui Nguyen, Elizabeth Meriwether, Jon Kern, Michael Lew, Joshua Conkel, and Mark Schatz. Alumni including Christopher Shinn, Lucy Thurber, and Lloyd Suh continue to be produced nationwide and beyond. Today's Younblood members are the playwrights you'll be talking about tomorrow.

work.title: Sisters In Blizzard
work.description: It is New England's biggest blizzard yet and two grown sisters are snowed in alone together when the house is frozen shut. This is their chance to finally get closer or finally kill each other.
